title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing guava in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about guava in a dream. It is a winter fruit characterized by its strong, hot smell, delicious taste, and the many health benefits of guava. It spoils during colds, and everyone loves to eat this fruit, but what does it do? What does it mean to see guava in a dream, and what does this dream come from in terms of interpretations of everything we will learn, and through this Today's text is the interpretation of seeing a guava in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a guava by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a guava in a dream means kindness, charity, or lawful money. A guava indicates an inability to eat, indicates gossip and gossip. Seeing an invalid guava also indicates loss, Whether in money or trade. It also indicates the dreamer’s fears and sorrows. Seeing a guava tree indicates success in real life. Seeing guava juice or drinking guava juice indicates the arrival of weakness and the death of worries and sorrows. Interpretation of the guava market: The vision of buying guava indicates the collapse of worries and sorrows. Buying guava in a dream also shows the dreamer’s urgent need to make judgments, but his fears will end. Interpretation of a dream about guava juice: Seeing him drinking guava juice symbolizes the dreamer’s good condition. Seeing the dreamer drinking guava juice indicates relief from the dreamer’s sadness. Seeing him drinking guava juice is only evidence of It eases the situation for the fortuneteller. Interpretation of a dream about guavaSeeing fruit in general is a sign of goodness and nourishment. Seeing a guava tree is a symbol of the end of arguments and disagreements. Seeing a guava tree, means that the dreamer will receive sustenance and blessings. Seeing a guava also symbolizes success and excellence. Interpretation Dreaming of a Green Guava: Seeing a green guava means success and ease in many matters. It also indicates that the dreamer will attain goodness and blessings soon. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a yellow guava. Seeing a yellow guava indicates the coming of adversity and temptation. The yellow guava in a dream also indicates the corruption of some of the dreamer’s possessions. Interpretation of a dream about a guava White: Seeing guava in white indicates the calmness that the dreamer feels. It also indicates the instability of the dreamer’s credit standing in his life. Other interpretations of the dream of guava. If you see yourself eating guava in a dream, this means that you will get money after hardships and fatigue. Guava also indicates a person Good speech. Seeing green guava fruits is a symbol of the collapse of some efforts and disagreements. As for seeing picking guava in a dream, it indicates a peaceful life and happiness.

title: Interpretation of smoke in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of tobacco in a dream: Tobacco has many harmful effects on human health, as it is an undesirable thing in life, and seeing it in a dream is not a good thing, as many scholars have confirmed that it brings anxiety and anxiety to its owner, as well as diseases, so we came to you through the daily article The Encyclopedia website has many different interpretations of seeing smoke in a dream for the fortuneteller, whether the woman is single or pregnant, as well as for the married man and the man. Follow us...Interpretation of smoke in a dreamSmoke in a dream according to Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq believes that seeing smoke in a dream brings to the dreamer many problems and worries that he is exposed to in a certain period of his life, but he can overcome them after a while, whether they are problems in his personal life or in his life. His work. Smoke in a dream for a single woman. Seeing smoke in a dream of an unmarried woman when she is happy is evidence that she will get into trouble through friends or a young man she knows, but they are harming her, or she will likely suffer from a disease that will destroy her. Her life, and there is a chance to get rid of all this evil very soon. And vice versa, if the smoke is visible in white, this is evidence that goodness has arrived and that it is time to get rid of the many problems that she has experienced in her life for a long time, except perhaps soon. Getting involved in a new, good man. Smoking in a dream for a pregnant womanContrary to what seeing smoke in a dream means for her opinion of worries and problems, it conveys to the pregnant woman the good news that the pregnancy period will go safely and smoothly and that the fetus will be healthy. And if she sees herself smoking, if she is happy, it shows her illness during pregnancy, but she will bear it forever. Smoke in a dream for a man. Whoever sees smoke surrounding him everywhere, this indicates that he is suffering from pain and diseases, in addition to living in illusions. But if the smoke It comes from hot food, so this is a sign of kindness and great comfort for its owner. Smoke in a dream for a married woman indicates that there are problems between her and her husband as a result of the interference of friends or relatives who want evil for them. If she is forced to smoke, this is a sign of her exposure to injustice, but she will soon get rid of all these problems. What is the interpretation of a dream about black smoke? Black smoke has many interpretations, including: If problems arise from a certain house and you notice smoke coming out of it, this means that the problems will end soon. If the dreamer sees him smoking and smoke comes out of it, this means that he fell in love with it and is successful. And whoever sees Smoke is rising, this is a sign of his success. If smoke surrounds the dreamer, it is a sign of illness or envy. These interpretations are considered jurisprudence by interpretive scholars and are simply an expression of the interpreter’s point of view, and not just to interpret a different dream, you can use the direct interpretation of dreams application.

title: Interpretation of a dream about flies, mosquitoes and gnats in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing flies, mosquitoes, and gnats are among the visions that cause anxiety to the fortuneteller. When a person sees a vision in a dream, he keeps part of the vision stuck in his mind, and because the person is curious by nature, he continues to think about the meaning of this dream and the connotations it carries, despite the interpretation. Of dreams, it is considered one of the things that people love. It is not useful in all cases, and some dreams should not be interpreted, because if the dream is alone, then once its interpretation is achieved, its interpretation will not be. For someone, it is also worth saying that it is not a requirement that the interpretation of dreams is always correct, as there are many wrong interpretations that do not come true. Read also: Toilet in a dreamInterpretation of seeing flies, mosquitoes, and mosquitoesInterpretation of seeing flies, mosquitoes, and mosquitoesRead also: Pregnancy in a dreamIt is known to everyone that Flies are among the most annoying insects for humans. Not only that, but they also cause the transmission of infection from one person to another and the spread of diseases, in addition to the fact that mosquitoes and gnats are not among most insects. Insects that are beloved to humans, and here, dear reader, is the interpretation of seeing flies, mosquitoes, and mosquitoes. Seeing many insects in a dream is evidence of the lack of blessing in the dreamer’s life. A man who sees flies in his dream is evidence of his pain and sadness, and it may also indicate his multiple sins. Whoever sees mosquitoes flying Around him and he did not name him means that there are many enemies who hate him. Read also: Penguin in a dream. Interpretation of seeing flies, mosquitoes, mosquitoes, and insects according to public commentators. Seeing flies, mosquitoes, and mosquitoes is disgusting, because of the harm these insects cause to humans, and through this article, dear reader, we will return to the interpretation of seeing Flies, mosquitoes, and mosquitoes, and here are the most important interpretations: When you dream of a swarm of flies in your room, this means that you will face problems. And if you see that there is a mosquito or you have been bitten by a mosquito, this means that you have done something bad. Read also: Washing the dead. Interpretation of seeing flies and mosquitoes And mosquitoes for a single woman. The interpretation of visions varies depending on the psychological and social state of the dreamer. Commentators said about the interpretation of seeing flies, gnats, and mosquitoes for a girl that this vision carries one of the following possibilities: Seeing a single woman with mosquitoes in her dream means that she will experience a failed love relationship. But if you see insects in general, this It means that she is sick. And if she sees that there are flies standing on her food, this means that there is someone in her life who keeps her well. Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream. Interpretation of seeing flies, gnats, and gnats for a married woman. Commentators said: If the dreamer is a married woman, this has different meanings. Completely for an unmarried woman, here is the interpretation of seeing flies, gnats, and mosquitoes for a married woman: Seeing flies in a dream means that she will suffer from severe psychological pain. When she sees gnats and mosquitoes, this means that there is enmity between her and her neighbors. And if she sees that she is expelling mosquitoes and flies from the house, then this It means she will give up

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing cats in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing cats in a dream. They are pets and the closest animals to people, as many people have a hobby of raising cats at home and there are many different types of cats, as they differ in terms of quantity, shape or color. Cats in the past were sacred animals and many statues were built for them. Many people see cats in their dreams, which makes them worried about this vision, and we will review it for you. Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing cats by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained in the books of interpretation that he sees cats as a symbol of deception and deception. Seeing a male cat in a dream symbolizes a thief as well as betrayal. Cats in Dreams indicate bad luck and deception. Seeing a cat in a dream indicates good luck for the dreamer. Seeing a hungry cat in a dream means poverty and need. Seeing cats is a harbinger of the coming of happy news. Also, seeing kittens in a dream symbolizes success, getting a job, or pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about seeing white cats: Seeing a white cat trying to interest you in a dream means that the dreamer longs for love, affection, and tenderness. Seeing a white cat in a dream shows how arrogant the dreamer is. Also, seeing a white cat of breathtaking beauty indicates the dreamer’s longing for marriage. Seeing a white cat Very difficult means sadness and failure to find what you want. Interpretation of a dream about brown catsSeeing brown cats in a dream indicates bad luck. Seeing killing a brown cat in a dream, this vision is praiseworthy, because black cats symbolize deception. Seeing a black cat walking towards you in a dream Indicates good luck. Seeing a black cat’s tail in a dream indicates luck in love. Seeing a brown cat also indicates sadness or grief. Black cats symbolize a cunning person that the dreamer will get to know in the future. Interpretation of a dream about seeing dead catsSeeing dead cats in a dream means That you will get rid of an enemy in reality and indicates the death of sorrows. Seeing a small, beautiful cat in a dream means comfort and happiness. Seeing an ugly cat in a dream indicates effort and sadness. Interpretation of a dream about cats for a single woman: Seeing a cat in one dream indicates the presence of a cunning person who does not deserve her love and is a traitor. Interpretation of a dream about cats for a married woman: Seeing cats in a dream for a married woman means failure in love and warning of shocks in her life. Interpretation of a dream about cats for a pregnant woman: Seeing cats in a pregnant woman’s dream is good news for a cleaner child and an indication of goodness and blessings for her.

title: I dreamed that I married Ibn Sirin again

preview.html: I dreamed that I married my husband again. Marriage is a sacred bond that brings two people together to live their lives together with happiness, understanding, affection, and compassion. Everyone who sees in her dream that she married her husband is surprised by this dream and rushes to search for meanings and connotations related to it. To her for fear of harming or hurting her, so we will explain in detail the explanations related to this topic in the following lines of the article. I dreamed that I married my husband again. There are many interpretations mentioned by scholars regarding seeing a woman marrying her husband, the most important of which are the following: If a woman sees in her dream that she has married again. From her husband, this is a sign of the many transformations that she will undergo in her relationship with her partner, and the dream may turn to her ability to find solutions to differences. And the quarrels that take place between them, and living with him in stability and happiness. Commentators also pointed to the wife’s dream of marrying her partner again as a sign that God - Glory be to Him - will carry her in the near future. If the woman gives birth to a son of marriageable age, this proves that the date of his marriage to a girl is approaching. Beautiful makes him happy in his life. Dreaming of a woman getting married again symbolizes that she will receive a lot of good news or that her partner will earn a lot of money. The Asrar website for dream interpretation is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write: A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get On the correct interpretations. I dreamed that I married Ibn Sirin again. Find out with us the various indications that were received from the scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - regarding seeing a woman getting married again: Whoever sees in her dream that she will marry her husband, this will lead to joy and psychological comfort and following a system. A wide diet awaits her in the coming days. If a woman marries a man who is not her partner, who is attractive and elegant, then this is a sign of the abundant goodness that God is giving her. And if a woman dreams that she is in a relationship with an unknown man, this is a sign that she will hear completely unpleasant news, which It may be a health problem or she is facing a crisis from which she cannot get out. If a married woman sees that she is marrying a dead person, these worries and sorrows will prevent her from feeling peace, contentment and joy in her life. I dreamed that I married my husband to a married woman. A woman’s dream of marrying her partner symbolizes the renewal of the relationship The romance between them, even if she has children, and seeing herself again linked to her husband leads to her excelling in her studies and obtaining the highest academic grades or a lot of money from a legitimate source. Interpretation scholars also explained that whoever sees herself getting married to her partner again in a dream, this is a sign of improvement. Her living conditions and that she is going with her husband to live in a new house are better than the previous one. I dreamed that I married my husband to a pregnant woman. If the pregnant woman sees during her sleep that she is marrying her husband again, according to the interpretation of Sheikh Al-Nabulsi and Imam Ibn Shaheen - may God have mercy on them - then this vision indicates the ease of childbirth, by God’s will, and not feeling it. A lot of fatigue and pain during the months of pregnancy, and God will protect us

title: Signs that you are pregnant. Signs indicating pregnancy in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Dreams indicate the approaching pregnancy Pregnancy with a boy Pregnancy with a boy Pregnancy with a boy Signs of pregnancy Seeing a cat in a dream means that a woman is pregnant, especially if she dreams that the cat is wearing her dress. If it is a male, she will give birth to a boy. But if she is a female, she has given birth to a girl. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that her husband is tanned, this means that she is pregnant and will give birth to a girl, but if the color of her face is white, this means that she is pregnant and will give birth. For a boy. Wearing clothes in a dream or adopting jewelry for decoration, all indicate that the woman is pregnant. Some jewelry may symbolize the birth of a boy, while others may symbolize the birth of a girl. A dream in which a woman sees herself standing at or near a well or drinking from it may indicate her pregnancy, specifically the pregnancy of a boy. In a dream, seeing a decorated vase in the house indicates that the woman is pregnant. She may give birth to a very beautiful daughter. Seeing Capricorn in a dream for a married woman means that she will become pregnant and give birth to a male child. Symbols that show the bearer - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a married woman getting married in a dream, which means that she got married in a dream

preview.html: Contents: The marriage of a married man The marriage of a woman who is not her husband to a known man From someone she knows I dreamed that I got married and I was already married Interpretation of marriages A woman’s dream of getting married, if she is married in a dream, is a strange dream for her, of course, but its meaning varies depending on the man she marries. He seeks to explain this, so he realizes that it may be better for her. If a woman marries her husband in a dream, it is said that this is a good diet for her, and sometimes a dream about a woman marrying her husband in a dream is interpreted as news of pregnancy. Anyone who also got married From her husband in a dream means that she will earn a lot if she is a merchant and will receive a reward at work if she is an employee. On the other hand, if a woman marries someone who is not her husband, but she marries in a normal life, this also indicates the wealth and goodness that accrues to her. Whoever marries If a married woman sees in her dream that she is marrying a man and in reality asks for her son’s hand in marriage or gives birth to a daughter of marriageable age, then her son or daughter will soon get married and it will be a pleasure for her to get married. She does not seek to marry her son, and she does not have daughters of marriageable age, and she sees that, so she will obtain goodness, blessings, and happiness in her life, unless she marries a foreigner who takes her to his home and sees that she is like that. In his bedroom, then it shows sadness or a problem that he will face. If a married woman dreams that she is married again, this reflects her nostalgia for the first stage of the relationship and her need for love and warmth after the cold period of their marriage. If a married woman dreams that she married a man other than her husband, this symbolizes To the good that will happen to her family from a business partnership that her husband enters into with someone. Psychology refers to a woman’s vision of her husband marrying another woman in a dream, to the jealousy or anxiety that she suffers in reality from her husband’s betrayal or loss. It is said that a husband’s marriage in a dream is a bad omen. It is evidence of sadness and they enter the house. When a married woman sees in her dream that she has married a dead person, this indicates her poverty and poor condition or her separation from her husband and children and her distance from her husband and children, and this will come true, God willing. As for her marriage to a man who has no status, but rather shows poverty while she is sick, this indicates death. As for a pregnant married woman, if she sees that she will only get married and does not see a marriage * nor a bride for her, then she will give birth to a girl, and if she sees that she is married. bride. Then she will give birth to a son, and whoever marries her husband will have happiness, love, and closeness more than ever before, and for the pregnant woman, there will be security and happiness for her heart. As for a married woman who is not pregnant, this indicates her happiness and connection in her life with her husband if she sees that. And when she sees a married woman marrying unmarried people, her marriage is completed with music or instruments such as the violin and instruments that make their voices heard, then there is no good in it. title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing cucumbers in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing cucumbers in a dream is considered one of the most acceptable vegetables for people because it contains many benefits that help strengthen their physical structure, and dreaming about it causes doubt and confusion in the souls of many about what its vision may contain. The article explains some of the most important interpretations that will benefit many, so let’s read them below. Seeing cucumbers in a dream The dreamer’s vision of cucumbers in a dream indicates that he is very fond of helping others and is ready to help the poor and needy and perform acts of obedience, and these are virtuous qualities that make others want to approach him and become a dream. Friends and a person dreaming of cucumbers during his sleep indicates that he will get a lot of money in the coming period. This will greatly contribute to improving his living conditions. If the dreamer sees a cucumber in his dream and in reality he is suffering from a serious illness, then this is a sign that he will find the medicine that the Lord (Glory be to Him) will make a cure for him. His health condition will gradually improve after that and he will return to his previous age, and if the dreamer sees cucumbers in his dream and they are new, this indicates that he got rid of the things that made him feel very uncomfortable. Seeing cucumbers in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer’s vision of yellow cucumbers in a dream It is an indication that he will be exposed to many unpleasant events at that time, which will cause him severe discomfort, and if he sees cucumbers during his sleep outside the season, then this is a sign that he will suffer from a serious health condition during. In case the dreamer sees cucumbers in his dream and it is his wife Carrying a child in it, it means that he will have a very beautiful girl and he will be very attached to her, and if the dreamer sees a cucumber in his dream and peels it and then cuts it, this is a sign that he will discover many things that have been modified behind his back, and he will suffer a great shock to someone close to him. Seeing Cucumbers in Nabulsi’s dream: Al-Nabulsi interprets a person’s dream of cucumbers in a dream as an indication that he will reap many benefits in his life in the coming period and that blessings will come a lot in his livelihood. He has many problems and disobeys him in an inappropriate way, and he will greatly regret that he did not raise him well. In case the dreamer sees a cucumber in his dream, it represents the presence of a woman trying to approach him and seduce him until he falls in love with her and urging him to commit indecency with her and not listen to her. To her and try to stay away from her as much as possible, and if the dreamer sees a cucumber in his dream and eats it, it symbolizes something that he wanted very much to come true soon. To get the correct interpretation, do a search on Google, a site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Seeing a cucumber in a dream for a single woman indicates an unmarried woman who Seeing cucumbers in a dream indicates that she will face many problems in her life in the coming period, which will contribute to a significant deterioration of her psychological state as a result. Goals. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is buying a cucumber, this is a sign of the good qualities that her future partner will have and will treat her well.

title: Interpretation of seeing the muezzin in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the muezzin in a dream. Many people seek to interpret dream symbols that seem strange to some and need interpretations for reassurance, such as the interpretation of seeing the muezzin in a dream. This is for a married or pregnant woman, or for a single man and girl, so we will provide you with explanations that answer all the details. Interpretation of seeing the muezzin in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the muezzin in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the muezzin in a dream. This is done through the most famous jurists. And the interpreters are as follows: There is almost a consensus among the interpreters that seeing the muezzin in a dream is a good thing, but there are some differences from one person to another depending on their circumstances. As for Ibn Sirin, he believes that seeing the muezzin is for a very wise and intelligent person who defends the rights of others. And if The muezzin’s voice was beautiful, as it is evidence that a person is righteous and follows the right path and achieves everything he dreams of in life. When you see the muezzin in the mosque, this is a harbinger from God of success in the search and livelihood. But if he sees the muezzin unable to communicate, this is a sign of illness and great sadness. According to Al-Nabulsi, if the dreamer sees the muezzin giving the call to prayer to a friend, this is evidence of the friend’s betrayal of him in reality. See also: Symbols that indicate problems. Interpretation of the muezzin’s vision for married couples. The vision for a married woman means: In the event that the muezzin is in the sky in a married man’s dream, it is a testimony to God’s will and her husband will obtain a prestigious job in his work. But if the married woman sees the muezzin He does this in a closed place, as this indicates her strong desire to leave the house to go to another home that is better for her or perhaps to travel to another country. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream Interpretation of the vision of the muezzin for single people The vision of the muezzin for an unmarried girl is: evidence that she will marry a good man, and that she She will be happy with that man. Hearing the voice of the muezzin in a dream is a sign that good news and abundant food will reach her. But if she sees the death of the muezzin, this indicates great suffering that will stand in the way of her marriage to the one she loves. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the muezzin for pregnant women. When the muezzin appears to the pregnant woman, it is Evidence that she gave birth very easily, and if she sees someone calling for prayer, this is evidence that she will receive good help during pregnancy. And if she sees her husband calling for prayer in a dream, this is evidence that the child is righteous and obedient to his parents, and the husband’s call may be a sign of his promotion to work. While if the call was missing in the dream, it is evidence of her stress during pregnancy and also of its incompleteness, but if she heard the call until the end, this is evidence that the pregnancy period passed peacefully. See also: Seeing home furniture and rooms in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the muezzin of a man. Interpretation of seeing the muezzin of a man: almost evidence of relief. For him and improving circumstances. If he is single, then this is evidence of his imminent marriage. But if he becomes a muezzin, then this is evidence of his good reputation among the people, and the call to prayer in the mosque is evidence of urging others to do good. If his wife is the one calling out in the dream, then this Evidence that he talks about people in their absence and makes up false stories. See also: Crying and injustice in

title: Interpretation of a dream about pieces of ice

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about pieces of ice in a dream. Many people want to know the interpretation of a dream about pieces of ice in a dream. Among the dreams in which many people want to know the interpretation of this vision. In interpretations, but with diligent scholars who seek to interpret dreams. Interpretation of a dream of cutting ice in a dream: Cutting ice in a dream can indicate a lot of money that the dreamer gets in his life. If someone sees that he is cutting ice, this may indicate that positive changes will occur In his life during this period. If a person sees that he is cutting ice, this may indicate getting rid of the problems and crises that he was facing at that time. Cutting ice cubes in a dream is a sign that may indicate the end of the debts that he suffered in the previous period, and God knows best. Interpretation Dreaming of cutting meat at a butcher in a dream: Anyone who dreams that he is cutting meat in a butcher shop indicates the great effort exerted by the person who has this vision. The days in which he cuts meat in a dream may indicate that some health problems that he has been exposed to recently have been overcome. This The latter, in the event that one believes that he is cutting forbidden meat, may indicate his action after vices and superstitions. Whoever cuts meat in a dream may indicate that he is traveling or searching for food and reaching it, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cutting hair in a dream If you see yourself cutting hair that is not Desirable in a dream, it may mean that you will get rid of the dreamer’s problems and fears. A dream of cutting hair may indicate that the visionary will experience some financial crises. Anyone who dreams of cutting his hair may indicate an accumulation of debts or a problem at work that he may face. In the event that one sees Cutting hair in a dream may be an indication of the end of worries and sorrows from the dreamer’s life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of cutting raw chicken in a dream: Anyone who dreams of slaughtering chicken can indicate getting rid of the bad events that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time. A dream about cutting a chicken in a dream may indicate that circumstances will change for the better, thanks to God. Whoever dreams of cutting a chicken may indicate getting rid of sins and transgressions that the dreamer has committed in the recent period. If one sees that he is cutting a chicken in a dream, this may indicate sincere repentance. To God, the Blessed and Almighty, by the grace of God. Interpretation of a dream about cutting a shirt in a dream: Whoever dreams that he is crying a tight shirt, may indicate that he will be freed from serious worries and sorrows in his life, thanks to God. If you see yourself cutting a shirt in a dream, this may indicate that you will get rid of Disappointment and betrayal. If a person sees that he has cut off his shirt, this may indicate the end of the financial crises that the dreamer was facing in the life of the past period. If one sees that he has cut off a shirt in a dream, this may indicate stability and a happy life that one is living at that time. Thanks to God.
